name: Starship Docking: Space Cruise
description:
Welcome to the research Space Station of the Starship Docking game, pilot. Here we explore cosmic surroundings of our Earth planet. That's why we need lots of special tools and other materials. And in your space shuttle there is a modern laser scanner for our new experiments.

Your main task now is a flawless docking of the shuttle, pilot. So let's start:

- Control the shuttle accurately and fly to the Space Station;
- Be extremely careful and find a free expansion place;
- Start docking and remember, you have only one attempt.

Starship Docking game Features:

- Realistic space surroundings of the Earth;
- Amazing research Space Station;
- Difficult shuttle docking mission;
- Chance to become a true space pilot.

Complete a dangerous mission and admire cosmos landscapes with Starship Docking game!
